src:
Policisti prosijo za informacije o prometni nesreči v Mariboru

07 Nov 2019, 22:22


Maribor, 7. novembra - Mariborski policisti prosijo za informacije o okoliščinah prometne nesreče, ki se je zgodila okoli 18.20 pri Mercatorju na Tržaški cesti v Mariboru. V nesreči sta bila udeležena srebrna osebna avtomobila VW Golf in Škoda Octavia, slednjo pa je po trčenju prevrnilo na bok. Nesreča se je končala s poškodbami.

Podrobnosti o poškodovanih na policijski upravi Maribor niso razkrili, morebitne priče nesreče pa prosijo, da se zaradi razjasnitve okoliščin prometne nesreče zglasijo na Postaji prometne policije Maribor oziroma pokličejo na 02/ 450 20 30 ali 113.
text:
Police officers are asking for information about a traffic accident in Maribor

07 Nov 2019, 21:22


Maribor, November 7 - Maribor police are asking for information about the circumstances of a car accident that happened around 6.20pm at Mercator on Tržaška Street in Maribor. The crash involved a silver passenger car, a VW Golf and a Skoda Octavia, which overturned the car after a collision. The accident ended with injuries.

The details of the injured at the Maribor Police Department have not been disclosed, and potential witnesses are asked to report to the Maribor Traffic Police Station or call 02/450 20 30 or 113 to clarify the circumstances of the accident.
